problem.markdown:
>>The following features can be added to Polls and Surveys:<< [x] Markdown [x] Images [x] Feedback [ ] Grading [x] Web links [ ] None of the above
Note: Make sure you select all of the correct options—there may be more than one!
[explanation] Markdown, Images, Feedback, and Web links can all be added to Polls and Surveys. [explanation]
problem.p: The following features can be added to Polls and Surveys:

div.p: Markdown, Images, Feedback, and Web links can all be added to Polls and Surveys.
